hooks.command: cmd=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.command // ""'); case "$cmd" in npm\ *|npx\ *) pkg_mgr=$(echo "$cmd" | cut -d' ' -f1); if [ "$pkg_mgr" = "npm" ]; then alt="pnpm"; elif [ "$pkg_mgr" = "npx" ]; then alt="pnpm dlx (or pnpm exec for local bins)"; fi; echo "{\"decision\":\"block\",\"reason\":\"Do not use $pkg_mgr. Use $alt instead.\"}";; *) ;; esac
